p: The deciduous tree Gleditsia sinensis Lam. (Leguminosae), is widely distributed in China, such as Hebei, Shandong, Henan, Shanxi, Shaanxi, Gansu, Jiangsu and Hunan Provinces. The fruit of G. sinensis is called “Da-Zao-Jiao” in traditional Chinese medicine and is also a natural raw material for washing products. In addition, the spines of G. sinensis known as “Zao-Jiao-Ci” in traditional Chinese medicine materials with anti-tumor, anti-inflammatory, anti-allergy, anti-angiogensis and antibacterial activities (Zhang et al. 2020). Here, we performed high-throughput sequencing of the whole platid genome of G. sinensis.
